entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 4.4.13
entry.content:
üîíSecurity release

This release bumps some of our dependencies and also addresses several security issues. Please update at your earliest convenience after taking a backup and ensuring that it's working.

What's Changed

üîíSecurity fixes

CVE-2022-25768 - Improper access control in UI upgrade process - Reported by @mollux, fixed by @mollux and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-x3jx-5w6m-q2fc

CVE-2024-47058 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - stored (edit form) - Reported by @MatisAct, fixed by @LenonLeite and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @avikarshasaha in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-xv68-rrmw-9xwf

CVE-2024-47050 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in contact/company tracking - Reported by @mqrtin, fixed by @patrykgruszka and tested/reviewed by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-73gr-32wg-qhh7

CVE-2021-27917 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in contact tracking and page hits report - reported by @Patrykgruszka, fixed by @lenonleite and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-xpc5-rr39-v8v2

CVE-2022-25770 - Removal of upgrade.php file which can have insufficient authentication - reported and fixed by @mollux, tested/reviewed by @kuzmany, @escopecz and @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-qf6m-6m4g-rmrc

ü™µ Changelog

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mautic/mautic/compare/4.4.12...4.4.13

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 5.1.1
entry.content:
Mautic 5.1.1: Alpheratz Edition

üîíSecurity release

This release bumps some of our dependencies and also addresses several security issues. Please update at your earliest convenience after taking a backup and ensuring that it's working.

What's Changed

üîí Security fixes

CVE-2022-25768 - Improper access control in UI upgrade process - Reported by @mollux, fixed by @mollux and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-x3jx-5w6m-q2fc.

CVE-2024-47058 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - stored (edit form) - reported by @MatisAct, fixed by @LenonLeite and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @avikarshasha in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-xv68-rrmw-9xwf.

CVE-2024-47050 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in contact/company tracking - reported by @mqrtin, fixed by @patrykgruszka and tested/reviewed by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-73gr-32wg-qhh7.

CVE-2021-27917 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in contact tracking and page hits report - reported by @Patrykgruszka, fixed by @lenonleite and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-xpc5-rr39-v8v2.

CVE-2024-47059 - User enumeration through weak password login prompt - reported and fixed by @tomekkowalczyk and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-8vff-35qm-qjvv.

CVE-2022-25770 - Removal of upgrade.php file which can have insufficient authentication - reported and fixed by @mollux, tested/reviewed by @kuzmany, @escopecz and @patrykgruzska in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-qf6m-6m4g-rmrc.

Twig library update by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/1411

üêõ Bugs

  • DPMMA-1020 Fix search email with special characters in campaign action by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10306
  • Improve grammar for unhide by @RCheesley in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13835
  • [UI] Hide profile picture if missing by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13838
  • FIX: Removes onConfigSave which invokes htmlspecialchars and escapes tracking script by @putzwasser in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13859
  • Fix critical error in segment details by @Frettyl in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13862
  • FIX: Makes anniversary date filter compatible with datetime by @putzwasser in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13871
  • [UI] fix CSS flexbox broken in campaign insert clone view by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13878
  • Fix for update read_count in email entity. by @abhisekmazumdar in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13915
  • Fix generatePageTitle to retrieve the correct page header tag. by @abhisekmazumdar in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13921
  • fix [DPMMA-2661] mapped field form 5.1 by @tomekkowalczyk in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13938
  • fix: attribution tooltip meaning by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13943
  • fix: focus item published by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13944
  • Fix: Create custom fields for lookup list. by @abhisekmazumdar in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13946
  • Replace SVG avatar with PNG for Gravatar compatibility. by @abhisekmazumdar in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13956

  • DPMMA-2679 Fix: Letters disappear when searching for emails to send in Campaign Builder by @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14032

  • @hugoprossaird made their first contribution in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13768
  • @matbcvo made their first contribution in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13967

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 5.2.0
entry.content:
Announcing Mautic 5.2.0: Pleiades Edition

A huge thank you to all the contributors who have submitted PRs for features, enhancements and bug fixes and for the amazing folks who have helped to test, code review and provide feedback. Without your help, this release would not be anywhere near as awesome as it is!

What's Changed

üîß Refactoring

  • Optimizing contacts activity API (refactoring of PR-10237 for Mautic v5) by @Moongazer in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/12305
  • Refactor DBAL execute method to executeQuery. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14139
  • Using "anonymous: lazy" to make the firewall lazy is deprecated, use "anonymous: true" and "lazy: true" instead. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14124
  • The "security.encoder_factory.generic" service is deprecated, use "scurity.password_hasher_factory" instead. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14125
  • [UI] Refactor hardcoded buttons using Twig template by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14233
  • [UX] Updating Blank theme to MJML by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14255
  • Referencing controllers with a single colon is deprecated. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14130
  • Update readme and devdocs link by @laurielim in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/14207
